name: Sort
natural_language_description: 这是 Sort 节点。主要用于: Change items order

type.name: type
type.description: The type of sorting to perform
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The type of sorting to perform | 默认值: simple

sortFieldsUi.name: sortFieldsUi
sortFieldsUi.description: The fields of the input items to sort by
sortFieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Sort By | 作用: The fields of the input items to sort by | 默认值: {}

code.name: code
code.description: Javascript code to determine the order of any two items

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: disableDotNotation (值: None) - Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
